summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2058, for the improvement of the south one-half of Weller Street, from Sixth Avenue South to Maynard Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of a bridge twenty-one (21) feet in width, with a twelve (12) foot walk, under Ordinance No. 20610, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
